en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
ny: "Tsopano tili ndi mbewa za miyezi 4 zomwe sizili ndi matenda ashuga zomwe kale zinali matenda ashuga," adawonjezera.

en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
ny: Dr. Ehud Ur, pulofesa wa zamankhwala ku yunivesite ya Dalhousie ku Halifax, Nova Scotia komanso wapampando wa gawo la zachipatala ndi sayansi la Canada Diabetes Association anachenjeza kuti kafukufukuyu adakali m'masiku ake oyambirira.

en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ny: Mofanana ndi akatswiri ena, iye amakayikira ngati matenda ashuga angachiritsidwe, akuwona kuti zopezedwazi zilibe kanthu kwa anthu omwe ali kale ndi matenda a shuga a mtundu woyamba.

en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ny: Lolemba, Sara Danius, mlembi wokhazikika wa Komiti ya Nobel ya Zolemba ku Swedish Academy, adalengeza poyera pa pulogalamu ya wailesi pa Sveriges Radio ku Sweden komitiyi, osakhoza kufikira Bob Dylan mwachindunji za kupambana mphoto ya Nobel ya 2016 mu Literature, adasiya zoyesayesa zake kuti amufikire.

en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
ny: Danius anati, "Pakali pano sitikuchita chilichonse. Ndaimbira foni ndi kutumiza maimelo kwa mnzake wapamtima ndipo ndinalandira mayankho aubwenzi kwambiri. Pakadali pano, zimenezo n'zokwaniradi."

en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
ny: Poyamba, CEO wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, adanena kuti kampaniyo inayamba pamene belu lake la pakhomo silinaamveke kuchokera ku shopu yake mu garaja yake.

en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
ny: Anamanga belu la khomo la WiFi, adatero.

en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
ny: Siminoff adati malonda adalimbikitsidwa pambuyo pa mawonekedwe ake a 2013 mu gawo la Shark Tank pomwe gulu lawonetsero linakana ndalama zoyambira.

en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
ny: Kumapeto kwa 2017, Siminoff adawonekera pa TV yogula QVC.

en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
ny: Mphete inathetsanso mlandu ndi kampani yopikisana ndi chitetezo, ADT Corporation.

en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
ny: Pamene kuli kwakuti katemera wina woyesera akuwonekera kukhala wokhoza kuchepetsa imfa za Ebola, kufikira tsopano, palibe mankhwala amene asonyezedwa bwino lomwe kukhala oyenera kuchiza matenda amene alipo.

en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
ny: Cocktail imodzi ya antibody, ZMapp, poyamba inasonyeza lonjezo m'munda, koma maphunziro ovomerezeka adawonetsa kuti anali ndi phindu lochepa kuposa kufunafuna popewa imfa.

en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
ny: Mu mayesero a PALM, ZMapp inatumikira ngati ulamuliro, kutanthauza kuti asayansi adaigwiritsa ntchito ngati mzere woyambira ndikuyerekeza mankhwala ena atatu ndi izo.

en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ny: USA Gymnastics imathandizira kalata ya Komiti ya Olimpiki ya United States ndipo imavomereza kufunika kotheratu kwa banja la Olimpiki kulimbikitsa malo otetezeka kwa othamanga athu onse.

en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
ny: Tikugwirizana ndi mawu a USOC kuti zofuna za othamanga athu ndi makalabu, ndi masewera awo, zingakhale bwino kutumikiridwa popita patsogolo ndi kusintha kwatanthauzo mkati mwa bungwe lathu, osati decertification.

en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
ny: USA Gymnastics imathandizira kufufuza kodziyimira pawokha komwe kungawunikire momwe kugwiritsa ntchito molakwika chiwerengero chofotokozedwa molimba mtima kwambiri ndi opulumuka a Larry Nassar akanatha kupita mosadziwika kwa nthawi yayitali ndikuvomereza kusintha kulikonse kofunikira komanso koyenera.

en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ny: USA Gymnastics ndi USOC ali ndi cholinga chofanana - kupanga masewera a masewera olimbitsa thupi, ndi ena, otetezeka momwe angathere kuti othamanga atsatire maloto awo m'malo otetezeka, abwino komanso opatsidwa mphamvu.

en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ny: M'zaka zonse za m'ma 1960, Brzezinski ankagwira ntchito kwa John F. Kennedy monga mlangizi wake kenako boma la Lyndon B. Johnson.

en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ny: Panthawi yosankhidwa mu 1976 adalangiza Carter pa zakunja, kenako adatumikira monga National Security Advisor (NSA) kuyambira 1977 mpaka 1981, kulowa m'malo mwa Henry Kissinger.

en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ny: Monga NSA, anathandiza Carter kusamalira nkhani za dziko lapansi, monga Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US-China ubale ankaganiza 1970s mochedwa; kusintha kwa Iran, komwe kunayambitsa vuto la ukapolo wa Iran, 1979; ndi kuwukira kwa Soviet ku Afghanistan, 1979.

en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ny: Kanemayo, yomwe ili ndi Ryan Gosling ndi Emma Stone, adalandira kusankhidwa m'magulu onse akuluakulu.

en: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ny: Gosling ndi Stone adalandira kusankhidwa kwa Best Actor ndi Actress motsatira.

en: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ny: Zosankhidwa zina zimaphatikizapo Chithunzi Chabwino Kwambiri, Mtsogoleri, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing ndi Original Screenplay.

en: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ny: Nyimbo ziwiri kuchokera ku kanema, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ndi City of Stars, adalandira kusankhidwa kwa nyimbo yabwino kwambiri yoyambirira. Studio ya Lionsgate inasankhidwa 26 - kuposa studio ina iliyonse.

en: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
ny: Kumapeto kwa Lamlungu, Purezidenti wa United States Donald Trump, m'mawu omwe adaperekedwa kudzera mwa mlembi wa atolankhani, adalengeza kuti asilikali a US adzachoka ku Syria.

en: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ny: Chilengezochi chinaperekedwa pambuyo poti Trump adakambirana pafoni ndi Purezidenti wa Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

en: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
ny: Turkey idzatenganso kuyang'anira ankhondo ogwidwa a ISIS omwe, mawuwo adati, mayiko a ku Ulaya akana kubwerera kwawo.

en: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ny: Izi sizimangotsimikizira kuti osachepera madinosaur ena anali ndi nthenga, chiphunzitso chofala kale, koma chimapereka tsatanetsatane wa zinthu zakale zambiri sizingatheke, monga mtundu ndi makonzedwe atatu.

en: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
ny: . Asayansi amati nthenga za nyama imeneyi zinali za chestnut-brown pamwamba ndi pansi pa pale kapena carotenoid.

en: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ny: Zimene apezazo zimaperekanso chidziŵitso cha chisinthiko cha nthenga m'mbalame.

en: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ny: Chifukwa nthenga dinosaur alibe bwino anayamba kutsinde, wotchedwa rachis, koma ali mbali zina za nthenga - barbs ndi barbules - ofufuza inferred rachis anali mwina pambuyo chisinthiko chitukuko kuti mbali zina zimenezi.

en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Kapangidwe ka nthengazo kamasonyeza kuti sizinagwiritsidwe ntchito pouluka koma m'malo mwake kulamulira kutentha kapena kuwonetsera. Ofufuzawo adanena kuti, ngakhale kuti umenewu ndi mchira wa dinosaur yaing'ono, chitsanzocho chimasonyeza nthenga zazikulu osati za nkhuku pansi.

en: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ny: Ofufuzawo adanena kuti, ngakhale kuti umenewu ndi mchira wa dinosaur yaing'ono, chitsanzocho chimasonyeza nthenga zazikulu osati za nkhuku pansi.

en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
ny: Bomba la galimoto linaphulika ku likulu la apolisi ku Gaziantep, Turkey dzulo m'mawa linapha apolisi awiri ndikuvulaza anthu ena oposa makumi awiri.

en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
ny: Ofesi ya bwanamkubwayo inati anthu khumi ndi asanu ndi anayi mwa ovulalawo anali apolisi.

en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
ny: Apolisi ati akuganiza kuti munthu wina yemwe akuti ndi msilikali wa Daesh (ISIL) ndi amene anachititsa zimenezi.

en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
ny: Iwo anapeza dzuwa ntchito pa mfundo zofanana zofunika monga nyenyezi zina: Ntchito ya nyenyezi zonse mu dongosolo anapezeka kuti kuyendetsedwa ndi luminosity awo, kasinthasintha awo, ndipo palibe china.

en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
ny: Kuwala ndi kuzungulira kumagwiritsidwa ntchito pamodzi kuti adziwe nambala ya Rossby ya nyenyezi, yomwe ikugwirizana ndi kuyenda kwa plasma.

en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
ny: Chiwerengero chochepa cha Rossby, nyenyezi yokangalika pang'ono ponena za kusintha kwa maginito.

en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
ny: Pa ulendo wake, Iwasaki anakumana ndi mavuto nthawi zambiri.

en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ny: Anabedwa ndi akuba, anaukiridwa ku Tibet ndi galu wachiwawa, anathawa ukwati ku Nepal ndipo anamangidwa ku India.

en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ny: Muyezo wa 802.11n umagwira ntchito pa maulendo onse a 2.4Ghz ndi 5.0Ghz.

en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
ny: Izi zidzalola kuti zikhale zogwirizana kumbuyo ndi 802.11a, 802.11b ndi 802.11g, malinga ngati siteshoni yapansi ili ndi mawailesi awiri.

en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ny: Kuthamanga kwa 802.11n kumafulumira kwambiri kuposa oyambirira ake omwe ali ndi maphunziro apamwamba a 600Mbit / s.

en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
ny: Duvall, yemwe ali wokwatiwa ndi ana awiri akuluakulu, sanasiye chidwi chachikulu pa Miller, yemwe nkhaniyi inali yokhudzana naye.

en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ny: Atafunsidwa ndemanga, Miller adati, "Mike amalankhula zambiri panthawi yomvetsera ... Ndinali kukonzekera moti sindinali kumva kwenikweni zimene ankanena."

en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ny: "Tidzayesetsa kuchepetsa mpweya wa carbon dioxide pa unit imodzi ya GDP ndi malire odziwika pofika 2020 kuchokera pamlingo wa 2005," Hu adatero.

en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
ny: Iye sanakhazikitse chiwerengero cha kudula, akuti adzapangidwa potengera zotsatira zachuma za China.

en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
ny: Hu analimbikitsa mayiko osauka "kuti apewe njira yakale yoipitsa choyamba ndi kuyeretsa pambuyo pake."

en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
ny: Iye anawonjezera kuti "sayenera, komabe, kupemphedwa kutenga maudindo omwe amapitilira gawo lawo lachitukuko, udindo ndi mphamvu."

en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
ny: Gulu la Phunziro la Iraq linapereka lipoti lake pa 12.00 GMT lero.

en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
ny: Limachenjeza kuti Palibe amene angatsimikizire kuti njira iliyonse yochitirapo kanthu ku Iraq panthaŵi ino idzaletsa nkhondo ya mipatuko, chiwawa chomakulakula, kapena kutsetsereka kulinga ku chipwirikiti.

en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
ny: Lipoti limayamba ndi pempho la kukambirana poyera ndi kukhazikitsidwa kwa mgwirizano ku United States ponena za lamulo la Middle East.

en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
ny: Lipotilo likutsutsa kwambiri pafupifupi mbali iliyonse ya ndondomeko yamakono ya Executive ku Iraq ndipo limalimbikitsa kusintha mwamsanga kwa njira.

en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ny: Choyamba pakati pa malangizo ake 78 ndikuti njira yatsopano yothandizira iyenera kutengedwa chaka chino chisanathe kuti ateteze malire a Iraq motsutsana ndi kulowerera kwaudani komanso kukhazikitsanso ubale ndi mayiko oyandikana nawo.

en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ny: Senator wamakono ndi Mkazi Woyamba wa ku Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner adalengeza kuti adzakhala pulezidenti dzulo madzulo ku La Plata, mzinda wa makilomita 50 (31 miles) kuchokera ku Buenos Aires.

en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ny: Mayi Kirchner adalengeza kuti akufuna kuyendetsa pulezidenti ku Argentine Theatre, malo omwewo omwe ankagwiritsa ntchito kuyambitsa kampeni yake ya 2005 ku Senate monga membala wa nthumwi za chigawo cha Buenos Aires.

en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ny: Mkanganowu unayambitsidwa ndi mkangano wokhudza ndalama zomwe amawononga pa chithandizo ndi kukonzanso pambuyo pa mphepo yamkuntho Katrina; zomwe ena osunga zachuma adalemba moseketsa kuti "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
ny: Kusuliza kwaufulu kwa kuyesayesa kwa kukonzanso kwasumika maganizo pa kupereka mapangano a kukonzanso kwa anthu amene amawaona kukhala amkati mwa Washington.

en: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ny: Anthu oposa mamiliyoni anayi anapita ku Roma kukapezeka pamaliro.

en: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ny: Chiwerengero cha anthu omwe analipo chinali chachikulu kwambiri moti sizinatheke kuti aliyense apeze mwayi wopita ku maliro ku St. Peter's Square.

en: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
ny: Ma TV akuluakulu angapo anaikidwa m'malo osiyanasiyana ku Rome kuti anthuwo aziona mwambowu.

en: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
ny: M'mizinda ina yambiri ya ku Italy ndi padziko lonse lapansi, makamaka ku Poland, anthu ambiri ankaona makonzedwe ofananawo, amene anthu ambiri ankawaona.

en: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
ny: Akatswiri a mbiri yakale adatsutsa ndondomeko zakale za FBI poyang'ana chuma pa milandu yomwe ndi yosavuta kuthetsa, makamaka milandu yamagalimoto yobedwa, ndi cholinga cholimbikitsa kupambana kwa bungwe.

en: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
ny: Congress inayamba kupereka ndalama zothandizira ndondomeko yonyansa mu fiscal 2005 ndipo inafotokoza mwachindunji kuti FBI iyenera kupereka nthumwi za 10 ku zolaula za akuluakulu.

en: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ny: Robin Uthappa adapanga innings yapamwamba kwambiri, 70 imathamanga mu mipira 41 yokha pomenya 11 fours ndi 2 sixes.

en: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
ny: Ma batsmen apakati, Sachin Tendulkar ndi Rahul Dravid, adachita bwino ndipo adapanga mgwirizano wa zana.

en: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
ny: Koma, pambuyo kutaya wicket kapitawo India kokha anapanga 36 akuthamanga loosing 7 wickets kuthetsa innings.

en: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ny: Pulezidenti wa dziko la United States, George W. Bush, anafika ku Singapore m'mawa wa pa November 16, ndipo anayamba ulendo wa sabata ku Asia.

en: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ny: Analandiridwa ndi Wachiwiri kwa Nduna Yaikulu ya Singapore Wong Kan Seng ndipo adakambirana nkhani zamalonda ndi uchigawenga ndi Prime Minister wa Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.

en: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ny: Pambuyo pa sabata limodzi la kutaya pa chisankho chapakati, Bush adauza omvera za kuwonjezeka kwa malonda ku Asia.

en: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ny: Nduna yaikulu Stephen Harper yavomereza kutumiza 'Clean Air Act' ya boma ku komiti ya chipani chonse kuti iwunikidwe, isanayambe kuwerenga kachiwiri, pambuyo pa msonkhano wa mphindi 25 Lachiwiri ndi mtsogoleri wa NDP Jack Layton ku PMO.

en: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
ny: Layton adapempha kusintha kwa bilu ya zachilengedwe ya osunga pa msonkhano ndi PM, akupempha "kulemba kwathunthu komanso kwathunthu" kwa bilu ya chipani cha Conservative cha zachilengedwe.

en: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
ny: Kuyambira pamene Boma la Federal linalowererapo kuti litenge ndalama za chipatala cha Mersey ku Devonport, Tasmania, boma la boma komanso ma MP ena a boma atsutsa mchitidwewu ngati njira yothandizira pa chiyambi cha chisankho cha boma chomwe chidzaitanidwe ndi November.

en: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
ny: Koma nduna yaikulu John Howard wati mchitidwewu unali kuteteza malo a chipatalacho kuti asachepetsedwe ndi boma la Tasmania, popereka ndalama zowonjezera za AUD$45 miliyoni.

en: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ny: Malinga ndi buletin yaposachedwapa, kuwerenga kwa nyanja kunasonyeza kuti tsunami inapangidwa. Panali ntchito ina yeniyeni ya tsunami yolembedwa pafupi ndi Pago Pago ndi Niue.

en: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
ny: Palibe kuwonongeka kwakukulu kapena kuvulala komwe kwanenedwa ku Tonga, koma magetsi anataya kwakanthawi, zomwe zikunenedwa kuti zinalepheretsa akuluakulu a Tongan kulandira chenjezo la tsunami loperekedwa ndi PTWC.

en: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
ny: Sukulu khumi ndi zinayi ku Hawaii zomwe zili m'mphepete mwa nyanja kapena pafupi ndi gombe zinatsekedwa Lachitatu lonse ngakhale kuti machenjezo adachotsedwa.

en: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ny: Pulezidenti wa dziko la United States, George W. Bush, anasangalala ndi chilengezochi.

en: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ny: Mneneri wa Bush Gordon Johndroe anatcha lonjezo la North Korea kuti "chinthu chachikulu pa cholinga chokwaniritsa denuclearization yotsimikizika ya chilumba cha Korea."

en: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ny: Mphepo yamkuntho yakhumi yotchedwa mphepo yamkuntho ya Atlantic, Subtropical Storm Jerry, idapangidwa mu Atlantic Ocean lero.

en: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
ny: Bungwe la National Hurricane Center (NHC) likuti panthawiyi Jerry sakuopseza dziko.

en: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
ny: Gulu la akatswiri a zomangamanga la ku United States linanena kuti mvula ya masentimita 6 ikhoza kuphwanya ngalande zomwe zinawonongeka kale.

en: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
ny: Ward Yachisanu ndi chinayi, yomwe inawona kusefukira kwa madzi mpaka mamita 20 pa nthawi ya mphepo yamkuntho Katrina, pakali pano ili m'madzi okwera m'chiuno pamene ngalande yapafupi inali pamwamba.

en: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
ny: Madzi akutsanulira pamwamba pa ngalandeyo m'chigawo cha mamita 100 m'lifupi.

en: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ny: Woyang'anira Commons Adam Cuerden adasonyeza kukhumudwa kwake ndi kuchotsedwa pamene adalankhula ndi Wikinews mwezi watha.

en: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
ny: "Iye [Wales] kwenikweni anatinamiza kuyambira pachiyambi. Choyamba, mwa kuchita ngati kuti zimenezi zinali pazifukwa zalamulo. Chachiwiri, mwa kunamizira kuti akutimvetsera, mpaka kuchotsedwa kwake kwa luso."

en: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
ny: Kukwiya kwa anthu a m'deralo kunapangitsa kuti panopa aziyesetsa kulemba ndondomeko yokhudza kugonana kwa malo omwe amakhala ndi mamiliyoni ambiri omwe ali ndi chilolezo poyera.

en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ny: Ntchito yochitidwa kwakukulukulu inali yamaphunziro, koma programuyo inalembedwa kuyerekezera zowonera zopangidwa ndi mlalang'amba wa Sagittarius.

en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ny: Zotsatira zomwe gululi linali kufunafuna zidzachititsidwa ndi mphamvu ya mafunde pakati pa zinthu zakuda za mlalang'amba ndi zinthu zakuda za Milky Way.

en: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ny: Mofanana ndi mmene mwezi umakokera padziko lapansi, kuchititsa mafunde, momwemonso Milky Way imakakamiza mlalang'amba wa Sagittarius.

en: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
ny: Asayansiwo anakhoza kunena kuti zinthu zakuda zimakhudza zinthu zina zakuda mofanana ndi mmene zinthu zokhazikika zimachitira.

en: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
ny: Nthanthi imeneyi imanena kuti zinthu zambiri zakuda kuzungulira mlalang'amba zili mozungulira mlalang'amba mu mtundu wa halo, ndipo zimapangidwa ndi tinthu tating'onoting'ono tambiri.

en: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
ny: Malipoti a pa TV amasonyeza utsi woyera wochokera ku chomeracho.

en: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
ny: Akuluakulu a mderalo akuchenjeza anthu okhala pafupi ndi fakitaleyo kuti akhale m'nyumba, kuzimitsa ma air-conditioner komanso kuti asamwe madzi a m'mipope.

en: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
ny: Malinga ndi bungwe la nyukiliya la ku Japan, radioactive caesium ndi ayodini zadziwika pa fakitaleyo.

en: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
ny: Akuluakulu a boma akuganiza kuti zimenezi zikusonyeza kuti makontena osungirako mafuta a uranium pamalopo angakhale ataphulika ndipo akutuluka.

en: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
ny: Dr. Tony Moll anapeza chifuwa cha TB chosagwira Mankhwala Kwambiri (XDR-TB) m'chigawo cha ku South Africa cha KwaZulu-Natal.

en: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
ny: Pofunsidwa, iye ananena kuti mtundu watsopanowu unali "wovutitsa kwambiri komanso wochititsa mantha chifukwa cha kuchuluka kwa imfa."

en: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
ny: Odwala ena angakhale atenga kachilomboko m'chipatala, Dr. Moll akuganiza, ndipo osachepera awiri anali ogwira ntchito zaumoyo kuchipatala.

en: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
ny: M'chaka chimodzi, munthu amene ali ndi matendawa akhoza kuyambukira anthu 10 mpaka 15 omwe ali pafupi.

en: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
ny: Komabe, chiwerengero cha XDR-TB m'gulu lonse la anthu omwe ali ndi chifuwa cha TB chikuwonekabe kuti ndi chochepa; Anthu 6,000 mwa anthu okwana 330,000 amene ali ndi matendawa pa nthawi iliyonse ku South Africa.

en: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
ny: Ma satellites, onse awiri omwe anali kulemera makilogalamu oposa 1,000, ndipo akuyenda pafupifupi makilomita 17,500 pa ola limodzi, adagundana makilomita 491 pamwamba pa Dziko Lapansi.

en: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
ny: Asayansi akuti kuphulika kochititsidwa ndi kugundana kunali kwakukulu.

en: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
ny: Iwo akuyesetsabe kudziwa kuti ngoziyi inali yaikulu bwanji komanso kuti Dziko lapansi lidzakhudzidwa bwanji.

en: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
ny: Bungwe la United States Strategic Command la ofesi ya Dipatimenti ya Zachitetezo ya ku United States likutsatira zinyalalazo.

en: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
ny: Zotsatira za kusanthula kwa chiwembu zidzaikidwa pa webusaiti ya anthu onse.

en: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
ny: Dokotala yemwe adagwira ntchito ku Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania adzapatsidwa mlandu wakupha kwambiri pambuyo poti amayi ake adapezeka atafa m'chikwama cha galimoto yake Lachitatu, akuluakulu ku Ohio akuti.

en: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
ny: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, adapezeka ku Blue Ash, Ohio, mzinda pafupifupi makilomita 15 kumpoto kwa Cincinnati atagona pansi pafupi ndi msewu mu T-shirt ndi zovala zamkati mu mkhalidwe wowonekera wa mankhwala ambiri.

en: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
ny: Anatsogolera maofesala ku Oldsmobile Intrigue yake yakuda yomwe inali mamita 500.

en: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
ny: Kumeneko, anapeza mtembo wa Saroja Balasubramanian, wazaka 53, wophimbidwa ndi mabulangete okhala ndi magazi.

en: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ny: Apolisi ati mtembowu ukuoneka kuti wakhalapo pafupifupi tsiku limodzi.

en: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
ny: Matenda oyamba a matendawa nyengo ino adanenedwa kumapeto kwa mwezi wa July.

en: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
ny: Matendawa amanyamulidwa ndi nkhumba, zomwe kenako zimasamukira kwa anthu kudzera mu udzudzu.

en: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ny: Mliriwu wapangitsa boma la India kuchita njira monga kutumiza anthu ogwira nkhumba m'madera omwe akukhudzidwa kwambiri, kugawira nsalu zikwizikwi za udzudzu ndi kupopera mankhwala ophera tizilombo.

en: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
ny: Mabotolo mamiliyoni angapo a katemera wa encephalitis alonjezedwanso ndi boma, zomwe zidzathandiza kukonzekera mabungwe azaumoyo chaka chamawa.

en: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
ny: Makonzedwe a katemera kuti aperekedwe kumadera omwe akukhudzidwa kwambiri m'mbiri chaka chino adachedwa chifukwa cha kusowa kwa ndalama komanso kuika patsogolo pang'ono poyerekeza ndi matenda ena.

en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
ny: Mu 1956 Słania anasamukira ku Sweden, kumene patapita zaka zitatu anayamba kugwira ntchito ku Swedish Post Office ndipo anakhala wojambula wawo wamkulu.

en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
ny: Anatulutsa masitampu oposa 1,000 a Sweden ndi mayiko ena 28.

en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
ny: Ntchito yake ndi ya khalidwe lodziwika bwino komanso mwatsatanetsatane moti ndi mmodzi mwa "mayina apanyumba" ochepa kwambiri pakati pa philatelists. Ena amadziŵa bwino kusonkhanitsa ntchito yake yekha.

en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
ny: Chidindo chake cha 1,000 chinali chachikulu "Zochita Zazikulu ndi Mafumu a Sweden" ndi David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mu 2000, chomwe chili mu Guinness Book of World Records.

en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ny: Analinso kugwira ntchito yojambula ndalama za banki m'mayiko ambiri, zitsanzo zaposachedwa za ntchito yake kuphatikizapo zithunzi za Prime Minister kutsogolo kwa ndalama zatsopano za Canada $ 5 ndi $ 100.

en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
ny: Ngoziyi itachitika, Gibson anapita naye kuchipatala koma anamwalira patangopita nthawi yochepa.

en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
ny: Woyendetsa galimotoyo, yemwe ali ndi zaka 64, sanavulale pangoziyi.

en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
ny: Galimoto yeniyeniyo inachotsedwa pamalo a ngozi pafupifupi 1200 GMT tsiku lomwelo.

en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
ny: Munthu wina yemwe ankagwira ntchito m'garaja pafupi ndi pamene panachitika ngoziyi anati: "Panali ana amene anali kuyembekezera kuwoloka msewu ndipo onse anali kukuwa ndi kulira."

en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
ny: Onse anathamangira kuchokera kumene ngoziyo inachitika.

en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
ny: Nkhani zina zomwe zili pa ndondomeko ku Bali zikuphatikizapo kupulumutsa nkhalango zotsala padziko lonse lapansi, ndikugawana matekinoloje othandizira mayiko omwe akutukuka kumene kukula m'njira zochepa zoipitsa.

en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
ny: Bungwe la U.N. likuyembekezeranso kumaliza thumba lothandizira mayiko omwe akukhudzidwa ndi kutentha kwa dziko lapansi kuti athane ndi zotsatira zake.

en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
ny: Ndalamazo zikhoza kupita ku nyumba zopanda madzi osefukira, kayendetsedwe kabwino ka madzi, ndi kusiyanasiyana kwa mbewu.

en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
ny: Fluke analemba kuti zoyesayesa za ena zoletsa azimayi kulankhula za thanzi la akazi sizinatheke.

en: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
ny: Iye anafika pa mfundo imeneyi chifukwa cha ndemanga zambiri zabwino ndi chilimbikitso chotumizidwa kwa iye ndi anthu achikazi ndi amuna omwe akulimbikitsa kuti mankhwala oletsa kutenga mimba awonedwe kukhala ofunika kuchipatala.

en: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
ny: Pamene kumenyanako kunatha pambuyo poti ovulalawo atengedwa kupita kuchipatala, pafupifupi akaidi ena 40 otsalawo anakhala pabwalo ndipo anakana kubwerera m'zipinda zawo.

en: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
ny: Okambirana anayesa kukonza mkhalidwewo, koma zofuna za akaidiwo sizikudziwika bwino.

en: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
ny: Pakati pa 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, moto unayambitsidwa ndi akaidi pabwalo.

en: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
ny: Posapita nthaŵi, apolisi okhala ndi zida zoletsa zipolowe analoŵa pabwalo ndi kukona akaidiwo ndi mpweya wa misozi.

en: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
ny: Magulu opulumutsa moto potsirizira pake anazimitsa moto pofika 11:35 madzulo.

en: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
ny: Damuli litamangidwa mu 1963, madzi osefukira a nyengo imene ankafalitsa matope mumtsinje wonsewo anaimitsidwa.

en: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
ny: Matope amenewa anali ofunika kwambiri popanga mchenga ndi magombe, omwe anali malo okhala nyama zakutchire.

en: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
ny: Chifukwa cha zimenezi, mitundu iwiri ya nsomba yasoloka, ndipo ina iwiri yatsala pang'ono kukhala pangozi, kuphatikizapo nsomba yotchedwa humpback chub.

en: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
ny: Ngakhale kuti madzi adzangokwera mamita ochepa pambuyo pa kusefukira kwa madzi, akuluakulu akuyembekeza kuti zidzakhala zokwanira kubwezeretsa mchenga wowonongeka pansi pa mtsinje.

en: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
ny: Palibe chenjezo la tsunami lomwe laperekedwa, ndipo malinga ndi bungwe la Jakarta geophysics, palibe chenjezo la tsunami lomwe lidzaperekedwe chifukwa chivomezicho sichinakwaniritse chofunikira cha 6.5.

en: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
ny: Ngakhale kuti panalibe chiwopsezo cha tsunami, nzika zinayamba kuchita mantha ndipo zinayamba kusiya mabizinesi ndi nyumba zawo.

en: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
ny: Ngakhale kuti Winfrey anali ndi misozi potsanzikana naye, amveketse bwino kwa mafani ake kuti adzabweranso.

en: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
ny: "Izi sizidzakhala zabwino. Ichi ndi kutsekedwa kwa mutu umodzi ndi kutsegulidwa kwa latsopano."

en: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
ny: Zotsatira zomaliza kuchokera ku chisankho cha pulezidenti ndi nyumba ya malamulo ku Namibia zasonyeza kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, Hifikepunye Pohamba, wasankhidwa ndi chigawo chachikulu.

en: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
ny: Chipani cholamulira, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), chinasunganso anthu ambiri pa chisankho cha nyumba ya malamulo.

en: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
ny: Asilikali a Coalition ndi Afghanistan anasamukira m'derali kuti ateteze malowa ndipo ndege zina za mgwirizano zatumizidwa kuti zithandize.

en: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
ny: Ngoziyi inachitika m'mwamba m'mapiri, ndipo akukhulupirira kuti inachitika chifukwa cha moto waudani.

en: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
ny: Zoyesayesa za kufufuza malo a ngoziyo zikukumana ndi nyengo yoipa ndi malo ovuta.

en: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
ny: Bungwe la zachipatala la Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres ndi bungwe la World Health Organisation likuti ndi mliri woipitsitsa umene walembedwa m'dzikoli.

en: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
ny: Mneneri wa Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman anati: "Angola ikupita ku mliri wake woipitsitsa ndipo zinthu zikukhalabe zoipa kwambiri ku Angola," adatero.

en: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
ny: Masewerawa adayamba nthawi ya 10: 00am ndi nyengo yabwino komanso kupatula pakati pa m'mawa drizzle yomwe idachotsedwa mwamsanga, inali tsiku langwiro la rugby ya 7.

en: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
ny: Tournament pamwamba mbewu South Africa anayamba pa cholemba bwino pamene iwo anali omasuka 26 - 00 kupambana ndi 5 mbewu Zambia.

en: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
ny: Kuyang'ana anatsimikiza dzimbiri mu masewera ndi alongo awo kum'mwera, South Africa Komabe pang'onopang'ono bwino pamene mpikisano patsogolo.

en: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ny: Chitetezo chawo cholangidwa, luso loyendetsa mpira komanso ntchito yabwino kwambiri ya gulu inawapangitsa kukhala oyimilira ndipo zinali zoonekeratu kuti iyi inali gulu lomenya.

en: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
ny: Akuluakulu a mzinda wa Amsterdam ndi Anne Frank Museum akunena kuti mtengowu uli ndi bowa ndipo umabweretsa ngozi ya thanzi la anthu pamene akutsutsa kuti unali pangozi yoyandikira ya kugwa.

en: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
ny: Linayenera kudulidwa Lachiwiri, koma linapulumutsidwa pambuyo pa chigamulo cha khoti ladzidzidzi.

en: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
ny: Zitseko zonse za m'phanga, zomwe zinatchedwa "Alongo asanu ndi awiri", ndi osachepera mamita 100 mpaka 250 (328 mpaka 820 mapazi) m'mimba mwake.

en: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
ny: Zithunzi za infuraredi zimasonyeza kuti kusiyana kwa kutentha kwa usiku ndi usana kumasonyeza kuti mwina ndi mapanga.

en: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
ny: "Iwo ndi ozizira kuposa malo ozungulira masana ndi kutentha usiku.

en: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ny: Khalidwe lawo lotentha silimakhala lokhazikika ngati mapanga akuluakulu padziko lapansi omwe nthawi zambiri amasunga kutentha kosasintha mwachilungamo, koma zimagwirizana ndi izi kukhala mabowo akuya pansi, "adatero Glen Cushing wa United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team ndi Northern Arizona University yomwe ili ku Flagstaff, Arizona.

en: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
ny: Ku France, kuvota kwakhala mwachikhalidwe chochitika chochepa: ovota amadzipatula okha m'khola, kuika pepala losindikizidwa kale la pepala losonyeza wosankhidwa wawo wosankha mu envulopu.

en: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
ny: Akuluakulu a boma atatsimikizira kuti munthu amene wavotayo ndi ndani, munthu amene wavotayo akuponya envulopuyo m'bokosi la mavoti n'kusaina mpukutu wa mavoti.

en: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
ny: Lamulo la chisankho la ku France limalemba mosamalitsa zochitikazo.

en: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
ny: Kuyambira mu 1988, mabokosi a voti ayenera kukhala omveka bwino kuti anthu ovota komanso anthu oonerera athe kuona kuti palibe maenvulopu omwe alipo kumayambiriro kwa mavoti komanso kuti palibe maenvulopu omwe amawonjezeredwa kupatula a anthu omwe amawerengedwa moyenera komanso ovomerezeka.

en: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
ny: Otsatira akhoza kutumiza oimira kuti akawone gawo lililonse la ndondomekoyi. Madzulo, mavoti amawerengedwa ndi odzipereka omwe akuyang'aniridwa kwambiri, potsatira ndondomeko zapadera.

en: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
ny: ASUS Eee PC, poyamba anayambitsa dziko lonse lapansi pazinthu zopulumutsa ndalama komanso ntchito, inakhala nkhani yotentha mu 2007 Taipei IT Month.

en: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ny: Koma msika ogula pa kompyuta laputopu adzakhala kwambiri zosiyanasiyana ndi kusinthidwa pambuyo ASUS anapatsidwa mu 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award ndi Executive Yuan wa Republic of China.

en: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
ny: Webusaiti ya siteshoniyi ikufotokoza kuti chiwonetserochi ndi "bwalo lakale la wailesi la sukulu lokhala ndi sapota watsopano komanso wonyansa wa geeky!"

en: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
ny: M'masiku ake oyambirira, chiwonetserochi chinawonetsedwa kokha pa wailesi ya intaneti yaitali ya TogiNet Radio, malo omwe amayang'ana pa wailesi yolankhula.

en: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
ny: Kumapeto kwa 2015, TogiNet inakhazikitsa AstroNet Radio ngati siteshoni yothandizira.

en: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
ny: Chiwonetserochi poyamba chinali ndi osewera mawu a amateur, am'deralo ku East Texas.

en: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
ny: Kufunkha kofala akuti kunapitirira usiku umodzi, popeza akuluakulu oyang'anira malamulo sanapezeke m'misewu ya Bishkek.

en: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
ny: Bishkek anafotokozedwa kuti akumira mu mkhalidwe wa "anarchy" ndi woyang'anira wina, pamene magulu a anthu ankayenda m'misewu ndikulanda masitolo a katundu wogulitsa.

en: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
ny: Anthu angapo okhala ku Bishkek anaimba mlandu anthu otsutsa ochokera kum'mwera chifukwa cha kusayeruzika.

en: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
ny: South Africa yagonjetsa All Blacks (New Zealand) mu mpikisano wa rugby union Tri Nations ku Royal Bafokeng Stadium ku Rustenburg, South Africa.

en: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
ny: Chiwerengero chomaliza chinali chigonjetso cha mfundo imodzi, 21 mpaka 20, kuthetsa All Blacks 'masewera 15 opambana.

en: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
ny: Kwa Springboks, inatha masewera asanu omwe adawonongeka.

en: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
ny: Inali mpikisano womaliza kwa All Blacks, yemwe adapambana kale chikho masabata awiri apitawo.

en: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
ny: Mpikisano womaliza wa mndandandawu udzachitika ku Ellis Park ku Johannesburg sabata yamawa, pamene Springboks idzasewera Australia.

en: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
ny: Chivomezi chochepa chinagwedeza kumadzulo kwa Montana nthawi ya 10:08 madzulo Lolemba.

en: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
ny: Palibe malipoti amwamsanga a kuwonongeka omwe alandiridwa ndi United States Geological Survey (USGS) ndi National Earthquake Information Center yake.

en: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ny: Chivomezichi chinali pa mtunda wa makilomita pafupifupi 20 (15 miles) kumpoto chakum'mawa kwa Dillon, ndipo pafupifupi makilomita 65 (40 miles) kum'mwera kwa Butte.

en: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
ny: Mtundu wa chimfine cha mbalame choopsa kwa anthu, H5N1, watsimikiziridwa kuti wapha bakha wakufa wakutchire, wopezeka Lolemba, m'madambo pafupi ndi Lyon kum'mawa kwa France.

en: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
ny: France ndi dziko lachisanu ndi chiwiri mu European Union kuvutika ndi kachilombo kameneka; kutsatira Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece ndi Italy.

en: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
ny: Nkhani zomwe zimaganiziridwa kuti ndi H5N1 ku Croatia ndi Denmark sizinatsimikizidwe.

en: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
ny: Chambers anali atazenga mlandu Mulungu chifukwa cha "imfa yofala, chiwonongeko ndi kuopseza anthu mamiliyoni ambiri okhala padziko lapansi."

en: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
ny: Chambers, yemwe ndi wosakhulupirira Mulungu, akutsutsa kuti mlandu wake ndi "wopanda pake" ndipo "aliyense akhoza kuzenga mlandu aliyense."

en: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
ny: Nkhani yomwe idaperekedwa mu opera ya ku France, ndi Camille Saint-Saens, ndi ya wojambula "yemwe moyo wake umalamulidwa ndi chikondi cha mankhwala osokoneza bongo ndi Japan."

en: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
ny: Zotsatira zake, ochita masewerawa amasuta mafupa a chamba pa siteji, ndipo bwalo lamasewero lenilenilo likulimbikitsa omvera kuti agwirizane nawo.

en: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
ny: Mlankhuli wakale wa Nyumba Newt Gingrich, bwanamkubwa wa Texas Rick Perry, ndi Congresswoman Michele Bachmann adamaliza pa malo anayi, achisanu, ndi chisanu ndi chimodzi, motsatira.

en: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
ny: Zotsatira zake zitabwera, Gingrich anayamikira Santorum, koma anali ndi mawu ovuta kwa Romney, yemwe m'malo mwake malonda oipa a kampeni adaulutsidwa ku Iowa motsutsana ndi Gingrich.

en: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
ny: Perry adanena kuti "adzabwerera ku Texas kukafufuza zotsatira za caucus usiku uno, kudziwa ngati pali njira yopita patsogolo ndekha mu mpikisanowu", koma pambuyo pake adanena kuti adzakhalabe pa mpikisano ndi kupikisana mu January 21 South Carolina primary.

en: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ny: Bachmann, yemwe adagonjetsa Ames Straw Poll mu Ogasiti, adaganiza zothetsa kampeni yake.

en: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
ny: Wojambula zithunzi adatumizidwa ku Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, komwe adamwalira pambuyo pake.

en: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ny: Akuti anali ndi zaka za m'ma 20. M'mawu ake, Bieber adati "[w]hile sindinalipo kapena kukhudzidwa mwachindunji ndi ngozi yomvetsa chisoniyi, malingaliro anga ndi mapemphero ali ndi banja la wovulalayo."

en: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
ny: Webusaiti ya nkhani zosangalatsa TMZ imamvetsetsa wojambula zithunzi adayimitsa galimoto yake kumbali ina ya Sepulveda Boulevard ndikuyesera kujambula zithunzi za apolisi omwe amaima asanadutse msewu ndikupitiriza, zomwe zinapangitsa wapolisi wa California Highway Patrol kuchititsa kuyimitsa magalimoto kuti amulamulire kubwerera kudutsa, kawiri.

en: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
ny: Malinga ndi apolisi, woyendetsa galimoto yomwe inagunda wojambula zithunzi sangayang'anizane ndi milandu ya milandu.

en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
ny: Pokhala ndi mendulo khumi ndi zisanu ndi zitatu zokha zomwe zilipo patsiku, maiko angapo alephera kupanga podium ya mendulo.

en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
ny: Amaphatikizapo Netherlands, ndi Anna Jochemsen akumaliza wachisanu ndi chinayi m'kalasi yoyimira akazi mu Super-G dzulo, ndi Finland ndi Katja Saarinen akumaliza khumi mu chochitika chomwecho.

en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Mitchell Gourley wa ku Australia anamaliza nambala khumi ndi imodzi mu Super-G yoyimira amuna. Czech mpikisano Oldrich Jelinek anamaliza khumi ndi zisanu ndi chimodzi mu amuna atakhala Super-G.

en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
ny: Arly Velasquez wa ku Mexico anamaliza nambala khumi ndi zisanu mu Super-G ya amuna okhala. Adam Hall wa ku New Zealand anamaliza wachisanu ndi chinayi mu Super-G yoyimira amuna.

en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ny: Amuna a ku Poland omwe ali ndi vuto la maso Maciej Krezel ndi wotsogolera Anna Ogarzynska adamaliza khumi ndi zitatu mu Super-G. Jong Seork Park wa ku South Korea adamaliza makumi awiri ndi anayi mu amuna okhala Super-G.

en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
ny: Anthu osunga mtendere a UN, omwe anafika ku Haiti pambuyo pa chivomezi cha 2010, akuimbidwa mlandu chifukwa cha kufalikira kwa matendawa omwe anayamba pafupi ndi msasa wa asilikali.

en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
ny: Malinga ndi mlanduwu, zinyalala zochokera ku msasa wa UN sizinayeretseke bwino, zomwe zinachititsa kuti mabakiteriya alowe m'mphepete mwa mtsinje wa Artibonite, umodzi mwa mtsinje waukulu kwambiri ku Haiti.

en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
ny: Asilikali asanafike, dziko la Haiti silinakumane ndi mavuto okhudzana ndi matendawa kuyambira m'ma 1800.

en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
ny: Bungwe la Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy latchula kafukufuku wodziimira payekha yemwe akusonyeza kuti gulu lankhondo la UN la ku Nepal lomwe limasunga mtendere mosadziŵa linabweretsa matendawa ku Haiti.

en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ny: Danielle Lantagne, katswiri wa bungwe la UN pa nkhaniyi, ananena kuti mliriwu uyenera kuti unayambitsidwa ndi anthu osunga mtendere.

en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
ny: Hamilton anatsimikizira Howard University Hospital anavomereza wodwalayo ali bwinobwino.

en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
ny: Wodwalayo anali kupita ku Nigeria, kumene milandu ina ya kachilombo ka Ebola yachitika.

en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
ny: Chipatalachi chatsatira ndondomeko yoletsa matenda, kuphatikizapo kulekanitsa wodwalayo ndi ena kuti asatenge matenda a ena.

en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
ny: Pamaso pa The Simpsons Simon adagwira ntchito pamawonetsero angapo m'malo osiyanasiyana.

en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
ny: M'zaka za m'ma 1980 adagwira ntchito pamawonetsero monga Taxi, Cheers, ndi The Tracy Ullman Show.

en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
ny: Mu 1989 adathandizira kupanga The Simpsons ndi Brooks ndi Groening, ndipo anali ndi udindo wolemba ntchito gulu loyamba lolemba chiwonetserocho.

en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
ny: Ngakhale kuti adachoka pawonetsero mu 1993 adasunga udindo wa wopanga wamkulu, ndipo adapitiriza kulandira madola mamiliyoni makumi ambiri nyengo iliyonse mu ndalama zachifumu.

en: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
ny: Poyamba bungwe lofalitsa nkhani la ku China la Xinhua linanena kuti ndege inabedwa.

en: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
ny: Malipoti apambuyo pake kenaka adanena kuti ndegeyo idalandira chiwopsezo cha bomba ndipo idapatutsidwa kubwerera ku Afghanistan, ndikutera ku Kandahar.

en: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ny: Malipoti oyambirira akuti ndegeyo inapatutsidwa kubwerera ku Afghanistan pambuyo poti idakanizidwa kutera mwadzidzidzi ku Ürümqi.

en: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
ny: Ngozi zam'mlengalenga ndizofala ku Iran, yomwe ili ndi zombo zokalamba zomwe sizikusamalidwa bwino pa ntchito za anthu ndi zankhondo.

en: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
ny: Zilango za mayiko zatanthauza kuti ndege zatsopano sizingagulidwe.

en: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
ny: Kumayambiriro kwa sabata ino, ngozi ya helikopita ya apolisi inapha anthu atatu ndikuvulaza ena atatu.

en: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
ny: Mwezi watha Iran inawona tsoka lake lalikulu kwambiri la mlengalenga m'zaka zambiri pamene ndege yopita ku Armenia inagwa, ndikupha anthu 168 omwe anali mkati.

en: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
ny: Mwezi womwewo unawona ndege ina ikugonjetsa msewu wothamanga ku Mashhad ndikugunda khoma, kupha khumi ndi zisanu ndi ziwiri.

en: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
ny: Aerosmith athetsa zoimbaimba zawo zotsala paulendo wawo.

en: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
ny: Gulu la rock linayenera kuyendera United States ndi Canada mpaka September 16.

en: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
ny: Iwo athetsa ulendowu pambuyo poti woyimba wotsogolera Steven Tyler adavulala atagwa pa siteji pamene akuchita pa August 5.

en: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
ny: Murray anataya seti yoyamba mu kupuma kwa tie pambuyo pa amuna onse awiri atagwira ntchito iliyonse mu seti.

en: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
ny: Del Potro anali ndi mwayi woyambirira mu seti yachiwiri, koma izi nazonso zinafuna kupuma kwa tayi atafika 6-6.

en: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
ny: Potro adalandira chithandizo paphewa lake panthawiyi koma adatha kubwerera ku masewerawa.

en: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
ny: Pulogalamuyi inayamba nthawi ya 8:30 madzulo nthawi yakomweko (15.00 UTC).

en: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
ny: Oimba otchuka kuzungulira dziko lonse lapansi anapereka bhajans, kapena nyimbo zodzipereka, kumapazi a Shri Shyam.

en: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ny: Woimba Sanju Sharma adayamba madzulo, motsatiridwa ndi Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan komanso. Woimba, Raju Khandelwal anali kutsagana naye.

en: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
ny: Kenaka, Lakkha Singh anatsogolera kuimba nyimbo za bhajans.

en: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
ny: Mbale 108 za Chhappan Bhog (mu Chihindu, zinthu 56 zosiyanasiyana zakudya, monga, maswiti, zipatso, mtedza, mbale etc. zomwe zimaperekedwa kwa mulungu) zinaperekedwa kwa Baba Shyam.

en: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ny: Lakkha Singh anapereka chhappan bhog bhajan komanso. Woimba, Raju Khandelwal anali kutsagana naye.

en: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
ny: Pa lachinayi nkhani yaikulu ya Tokyo Game Show, pulezidenti Nintendo Satoru Iwata anaulula Kapangidwe Mtsogoleri kwa kampani yatsopano Nintendo Revolution kutonthoza.

en: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
ny: Mofanana ndi wailesi yakanema yakutali, woyang'anira amagwiritsa ntchito masensa awiri omwe amaikidwa pafupi ndi wailesi yakanema ya wogwiritsa ntchito kuti ariangulate malo ake m'malo atatu.

en: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ny: Izi zidzalola osewera kulamulira zochita ndi mayendedwe mu masewera a kanema mwa kusuntha chipangizocho kudzera mlengalenga.

en: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
ny: Giancarlo Fisichella anataya ulamuliro wa galimoto yake ndipo anathetsa mpikisano mwamsanga pambuyo poyambira.

en: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
ny: Mnzake Fernando Alonso anali kutsogolera kwambiri mpikisano, koma anathetsa izo pambuyo pa dzenje lake-amasiya, mwina chifukwa moipa tucked kumanja kutsogolo gudumu.

en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
ny: Michael Schumacher anathetsa mpikisano wake pasanapite nthawi yaitali pambuyo pa Alonso, chifukwa cha kuwonongeka kwa kuyimitsidwa mu nkhondo zambiri pa mpikisano.

en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
ny: "Iye ndi wokongola kwambiri ndipo amaimba bwino kwambiri, nayenso," adatero malinga ndi malemba a msonkhano wa atolankhani.

en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
ny: "Ndinkakhudzidwa nthawi iliyonse tikamachita kuyeseza pa izi, kuchokera pansi pa mtima wanga."

en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
ny: Kuzungulira 3 mphindi mu kukhazikitsidwa, pa bolodi kamera anasonyeza zidutswa zambiri kutchinjiriza thovu yopuma kutali ndi thanki mafuta.

en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
ny: Komabe, iwo sakuganiza kuti anawononga chombocho.

en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
ny: Mkulu wa pulogalamu ya shuttle ya NASA N. Wayne Hale Jr. adati thovu linagwa "pambuyo pa nthawi yomwe tikudera nkhawa."

en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
ny: Mphindi zisanu mu chiwonetsero mphepo imayamba kugubuduza, pafupifupi mphindi imodzi pambuyo pake, mphepo ikufika 70km / h ... kenako mvula imabwera, koma yolimba kwambiri komanso yaikulu kwambiri moti imamenya khungu lanu ngati singano, kenako matalala anagwa kuchokera kumwamba, anthu akuchita mantha ndipo akufuula ndi kuthamanga wina ndi mnzake.

en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ny: Ndinataya mlongo wanga ndi bwenzi lake, ndipo paulendo wanga panali anthu awiri olumala m'mipando yamagudumu, anthu ankangodumpha ndi kuwakankhira," adatero Armand Versace.

en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
ny: NHK inanenanso kuti fakitale ya nyukiliya ya Kashiwazaki Kariwa ku Niigata prefecture ikugwira ntchito bwinobwino.

en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
ny: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. inanena kuti palibe zotsatira za chivomezichi komanso kuti makina a Number 1 ndi 2 pa fakitale yake ya nyukiliya ya Shika anatsekedwa.

en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
ny: Akuti nyumba pafupifupi 9400 m'derali zilibe madzi ndipo pafupifupi 100 zilibe magetsi.

en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
ny: Misewu ina yawonongeka, ntchito ya njanji yasokonezedwa m'madera omwe akukhudzidwa, ndipo ndege ya Noto ku Ishikawa prefecture idakali yotsekedwa.

en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
ny: Bomba limodzi linaphulika kunja kwa ofesi ya bwanamkubwa.

en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
ny: Mabomba ena atatu anaphulika pafupi ndi nyumba za boma m'maola awiri.

en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
ny: Malipoti ena amaika chiwerengero cha imfa za boma pa asanu ndi atatu, ndipo malipoti aboma amatsimikizira kuti mpaka 30 anavulala; koma manambala omaliza sakudziwikabe.

en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
ny: Onse a cyanuric acid ndi melamine adapezeka mu zitsanzo za mkodzo kuchokera ku ziweto zomwe zinafa pambuyo podya chakudya cha ziweto choipitsidwa.

en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
ny: Mankhwala awiriwa amachitapo kanthu wina ndi mnzake kuti apange makristali omwe angalepheretse ntchito ya impso, ofufuza ku yunivesiteyi adati.

en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
ny: Ofufuzawo adawona makristali opangidwa mu mkodzo wa mphaka ndi kuwonjezera kwa melamine ndi cyanuric acid.

en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ny: Mapangidwe a makristali awa amafanana ndi omwe amapezeka mkodzo wa ziweto zomwe zimakhudzidwa poyerekeza ndi infuraredi spectroscopy (FTIR).

en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
ny: Sindikudziwa ngati mukuzindikira kapena ayi, koma katundu wambiri wochokera ku Central America adabwera m'dziko lino popanda msonkho.

en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
ny: Komabe makumi asanu ndi atatu peresenti ya katundu wathu anaperekedwa msonkho kudzera mu mitengo m'mayiko a ku Central America. timakuchitirani.

en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
ny: Zimenezo sizinaoneke ngati zomveka kwa ine; ndithudi sizinali chilungamo.

en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
ny: Zonse zomwe ndimanena kwa anthu ndikuti mumatichitira momwe timakuchitirani.

en: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
ny: Bwanamkubwa wa California Arnold Schwarzenegger anasaina lamulo loletsa kugulitsa kapena kubwereka masewera achiwawa a pakompyuta kwa ana aang'ono.

en: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
ny: Lamuloli limafuna kuti masewera achiwawa a pakompyuta omwe amagulitsidwa m'boma la California alembedwe ndi kuwerenga kwa decal "18" ndipo amachititsa kuti kugulitsa kwawo kwa wamng'ono kulangidwe ndi chindapusa cha $ 1000 pa mlandu uliwonse.

en: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
ny: Mtsogoleri wa Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, adapereka mawu m'mawa uno akulengeza za kuzengedwa mlandu kwa onse a Huhne ndi Pryce.

en: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
ny: Huhne watha ntchito ndipo adzalowedwa m'malo mu Cabinet ndi Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP akuyembekezeka kutenga ntchito ya Business Minister Davey akuchotsa.

en: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
ny: Huhne ndi Pryce akuyembekezeka kukaonekera ku khoti la Westminster Magistrates pa February 16.

en: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
ny: Anthu amene anafa anali Nicholas Alden, 25, ndi Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback anali dalaivala.

en: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
ny: Edgar Veguilla adalandira mabala a mkono ndi nsagwada pamene Kristoffer Schneider adasiyidwa akufuna opaleshoni yomanga nkhope yake.

en: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
ny: Chida cha Uka chinalephera pomwe chinaloza mutu wa munthu wachisanu. Schneider ali ndi ululu wopitilira, khungu m'diso limodzi, gawo losowa la chigaza ndi nkhope yomangidwanso kuchokera ku titaniyamu.

en: Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
ny: Schneider anachitira umboni kudzera pa videolink kuchokera ku maziko a USAF m'dziko lakwawo.

en: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
ny: Kupitilira chochitika cha Lachitatu, Carpanedo adapikisana m'mipikisano iwiri payekha pa Championships.

en: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
ny: Choyamba chake chinali Slalom, komwe adapeza Did Not Finish mu kuthamanga kwake koyamba. 36 mwa mpikisano wa 116 anali ndi zotsatira zofanana mu mpikisano umenewo.

en: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
ny: Mpikisano wake wina, Giant Slalom, adamuwona akumaliza mu khumi m'gulu la akazi okhala ndi nthawi yophatikizidwa yothamanga ya 4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 mphindi pang'onopang'ono kuposa womaliza malo oyamba Austrian Claudia Loesch ndi 1: 09.02 mphindi pang'onopang'ono kuposa womaliza malo asanu ndi anayi Gyöngyi Dani wa ku Hungary.

en: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
ny: Skiers anayi mu gulu akazi okhala analephera kumaliza kuthamanga awo, ndipo 45 wa 117 okwana skiers mu Giant Slalom analephera udindo mu mpikisano.

en: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
ny: Apolisi a Madhya Pradesh anapeza laputopu yobedwa ndi foni yam'manja.

en: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".
ny: Wachiwiri kwa Inspector General D K Arya adati, "Tagwira anthu asanu omwe adagwirira mkazi wa ku Switzerland ndikupeza mafoni ake ndi laputopu".

en: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.
ny: Omwe akuimbidwa mlanduwo amatchedwa Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar ndi Vishnu Kanjar.

en: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
ny: Woyang'anira apolisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki adati woimbidwa mlanduyo adawonekera ku khoti ndi nkhope zophimbidwa.

en: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
ny: Ngakhale kuti anthu atatu anali mkati mwa nyumbayo pamene galimotoyo inaikhudza, palibe aliyense wa iwo amene anavulala.

en: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
