ny: M'madera amkati a kumpoto kwa India ndi Pakistan, yogurt imagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri mu curries; kum'mwera kwa India ndi madera ena a m'mphepete mwa nyanja a subcontinent, mkaka wa kokonati umagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri.

en: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
ny: Ndi zilumba 17,000 kusankha, Indonesia chakudya ndi ambulera mawu kuphimba zosiyanasiyana cuisines dera opezeka kudutsa mtundu.

en: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
ny: Koma, ngati agwiritsidwa ntchito popanda ma qualifiers ena, mawuwa amakonda kutanthauza chakudya chochokera kumadera apakati ndi kum'mawa kwa chilumba chachikulu cha Java.

en: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ny: Tsopano likupezeka kwambiri m'zilumba zonse, zakudya za ku Java zimakhala ndi zakudya zosiyanasiyana zokometsera chabe, zokometsera zambiri zomwe anthu a ku Java amakonda kukhala mtedza, chillies, shuga (makamaka shuga wa kokonati wa Javanese) ndi zonunkhira zosiyanasiyana zonunkhira.

en: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
ny: Stirrups ndi zothandizira mapazi a wokwera omwe amapachikidwa pansi kumbali iliyonse ya mpando.

en: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
ny: Amapereka kukhazikika kwakukulu kwa wokwera koma akhoza kukhala ndi nkhawa za chitetezo chifukwa cha kuthekera kwa mapazi a wokwera kuti agwidwe mwa iwo.

en: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
ny: Ngati wokwera waponyedwa pa kavalo koma ali ndi phazi logwidwa ndi stirrup, iwo akhoza kukokedwa ngati kavaloyo athawa. Pofuna kuchepetsa chiopsezochi, njira zingapo zotetezera chitetezo zingatengedwe.

en: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
ny: Choyamba, okwera ambiri amavala nsapato zokwera ndi chidendene ndi chosalala, chopapatiza kwambiri, chokha.

en: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
ny: Kenaka, mipando ina, makamaka mipando ya Chingelezi, ili ndi mipiringidzo yotetezera imene imalola chikopa cha stirrup kugwa pa mpando ngati chikokedwa kumbuyo ndi wokwera akugwa.

en: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
ny: Cochamó Valley - Chile Premier kukwera kopita, amadziwika monga Yosemite wa South America, ndi zosiyanasiyana granite makoma akuluakulu ndi miyala.

en: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
ny: Misonkhano yapamwamba imaphatikizapo malingaliro ochititsa mpweya kuchokera pachimake. Okwera kuchokera kumadera onse a dziko lapansi akupitirizabe kukhazikitsa njira zatsopano pakati pa kuthekera kwake kosatha kwa makoma.

en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
ny: Downhill snowsports, zomwe zimaphatikizapo skiing ndi snowboarding, ndi masewera otchuka omwe amaphatikizapo kutsetsereka pansi pa malo ophimbidwa ndi chipale chofewa ndi skis kapena snowboard yophatikizidwa kumapazi anu.

en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
ny: Skiing ndi ntchito yaikulu yoyendayenda ndi okonda ambiri, nthawi zina amadziwika kuti "ski bums," akukonzekera tchuthi chonse kuzungulira skiing pamalo enaake.

en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
ny: Lingaliro la skiing ndi lakale kwambiri - zojambula za m'mapanga zosonyeza skiers zinayambira ku 5000 BC!

en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ny: Downhill skiing monga masewera amabwerera ku zaka zosachepera za zana la 17, ndipo mu 1861 kalabu yoyamba ya ski yosangalatsa inatsegulidwa ndi anthu a ku Norway ku Australia.

en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
ny: Backpacking ndi ski: Ntchitoyi imatchedwanso backcountry ski, ski touring kapena ski hiking.

en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
ny: Zimagwirizana koma nthawi zambiri sizikuphatikizapo maulendo a alpine style ski kapena kukwera mapiri, omalizira omwe amachitidwa m'malo otsetsereka ndipo amafuna skis ndi nsapato zolimba kwambiri.

en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
ny: Ganizirani za njira ya skiing monga njira yofanana yokwera.

en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ny: M'mikhalidwe yabwino mudzatha kuphimba mitunda yaikulu pang'ono kuposa kuyenda - koma kawirikawiri kwambiri mudzapeza liwiro la mtanda dziko skiing popanda chikwama cholemera mu mayendedwe okonzedwa.

en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
ny: Europe ndi kontinenti yomwe ndi yaing'ono koma ili ndi mayiko ambiri odziimira pawokha. Pansi pa mikhalidwe yabwinobwino, kuyenda m'mayiko ambiri kungatanthauze kuti muyenera kudutsa ntchito za visa ndi kulamulira pasipoti nthawi zambiri.

en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
ny: Komabe, dera la Schengen limagwira ntchito ngati dziko limodzi pankhaniyi.

en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
ny: Malingana ngati mutakhala m'dera lino, nthawi zambiri mukhoza kudutsa malire popanda kudutsa malo oyang'anira pasipoti kachiwiri.

en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
ny: Mofananamo, pokhala ndi visa ya Schengen, simukusowa kupempha ma visa ku mayiko aliwonse omwe ali mamembala a Schengen mosiyana, motero mukusunga nthawi, ndalama ndi mapepala.

en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
ny: Palibe tanthauzo lonse lomwe zinthu zopangidwa ndi zakale. Mabungwe ena a misonkho amafotokoza kuti katundu wazaka zoposa 100 ndi zakale.

en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
ny: Tanthauzo lake lili ndi kusiyana kwa malo, kumene malire a zaka angakhale ochepa m'malo monga North America kuposa ku Ulaya.

en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
ny: Mankhwala a manja angafotokozedwe ngati zakale, ngakhale kuti ndi aang'ono kuposa katundu wofanana ndi misa.

en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
ny: Reindeer husbandry ndi moyo wofunika kwambiri pakati pa Sámi ndipo chikhalidwe chozungulira malonda ndi chofunikanso kwa ambiri omwe ali ndi ntchito zina.

en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
ny: Ngakhale mwachikhalidwe, ngakhale, si onse Sámi akhala akugwira nawo ntchito yaikulu ya reindeer husbandry, koma adakhala ndi moyo kuchokera ku nsomba, kusaka ndi zofanana, kukhala ndi reindeer makamaka ngati nyama zolemba.

en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
ny: Lerolino ambiri a ku Sámi amagwira ntchito zamakono. Zokopa alendo ndi ndalama zofunika kwambiri ku Sápmi, dera la Sámi.

en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
ny: Ngakhale kuti amagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri, makamaka pakati pa anthu omwe si Aromani, mawu akuti "Gypsy" nthawi zambiri amaonedwa kuti ndi okhumudwitsa chifukwa cha mayanjano ake ndi malingaliro oipa komanso malingaliro olakwika a anthu Romani.

en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
ny: Ngati dziko limene mudzakhala mukuyendera limakhala pansi pa uphungu woyendayenda, inshuwalansi yanu yaumoyo woyendayenda kapena inshuwalansi yanu yochotsa ulendo ingakhudzidwe.

en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
ny: Mungafunenso kufunsa malangizo a maboma ena osati anu, koma malangizo awo amapangidwira nzika zawo.

en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
ny: Monga chitsanzo chimodzi, nzika za America ku Middle East zingakumane ndi zochitika zosiyanasiyana kuchokera kwa Azungu kapena Aluya.

en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
ny: Malangizo amangofotokoza mwachidule za mkhalidwe wa ndale m'dziko limodzi.

en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ny: Malingaliro omwe amaperekedwa nthawi zambiri amakhala a cursory, general ndi oversimplified poyerekeza ndi zambiri zomwe zilipo kwina kulikonse.

en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
ny: Nyengo yovuta kwambiri ndiyo liwu la nyengo iliyonse yoopsa imene ingawononge, kusokonezeka kwakukulu kwa anthu, kapena kutaya moyo wa munthu.

en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
ny: Nyengo yovuta ikhoza kuchitika kulikonse padziko lapansi, ndipo pali mitundu yosiyanasiyana, yomwe ingadalire malo, topography, ndi mikhalidwe ya mlengalenga.

en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
ny: Mphepo yamphamvu, matalala, mvula yochuluka, ndi moto wa m'tchire ndizo mitundu ndi ziyambukiro za nyengo yovuta, monganso mabingu, mphepo yamkuntho, madzi, ndi mphepo yamkuntho.

en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
ny: Nyengo yovuta ya m'madera ndi nyengo imaphatikizapo mphepo yamkuntho, chipale chofeŵa, mkuntho wa ayezi, ndi mkuntho wa fumbi.

en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
ny: Apaulendo akulangizidwa kwambiri kuti adziwe za chiopsezo chilichonse cha nyengo yovuta yomwe ikukhudza dera lawo chifukwa zingakhudze mapulani aliwonse oyenda.

en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
ny: Aliyense amene akukonzekera kupita kudziko limene lingawonedwe ngati malo ankhondo ayenera kuphunzitsidwa ntchito.

en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
ny: Kufufuza kwa intaneti kwa 'Maphunziro a chilengedwe chodana' mwina kudzapereka adiresi ya kampani yakumaloko.

en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
ny: Kaŵirikaŵiri maphunziro adzafotokoza nkhani zonse zokambidwa pano mwatsatanetsatane kwambiri, kaŵirikaŵiri ndi chidziŵitso chothandiza.

en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
ny: Maphunziro nthawi zambiri adzakhala ochokera masiku a 2-5 ndipo adzaphatikizapo kusewera udindo, chithandizo choyamba chambiri komanso nthawi zina maphunziro a zida.

en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
ny: Mabuku ndi magazini onena za kupulumuka kwa m'chipululu nzofala, koma zofalitsa zokhudza madera ankhondo nzochepa.

en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
ny: Voyagers akukonzekera opaleshoni yosintha kugonana kunja ayenera kuonetsetsa kuti akunyamula zikalata zovomerezeka paulendo wobwerera.

en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
ny: Kufunitsitsa kwa maboma kupereka mapasipoti ndi amuna kapena akazi osatchulidwa (X) kapena zikalata zosinthidwa kuti zigwirizane ndi dzina lofunidwa ndi kugonana kumasiyanasiyana.

en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
ny: Kufunitsitsa kwa maboma akunja kulemekeza zikalata zimenezi n'kosinthika kwambiri.

en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
ny: Kufufuza pamalo oyang'anira chitetezo kwakhalanso kolowerera kwambiri m'nyengo ya pambuyo pa September 11, 2001.

en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
ny: Anthu a transgender omwe asanayambe kugwira ntchito sayenera kuyembekezera kudutsa ma scanner ndi chinsinsi chawo ndi ulemu wawo wosasinthika.

en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
ny: Mafunde a rip ndiwo kubwerera kwa mafunde ophwanya gombe, kaŵirikaŵiri pa reef kapena ofanana.

en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
ny: Chifukwa cha topology ya m'madzi kubwerera kumakhazikika pa zigawo zingapo zakuya, ndipo kuthamanga kwa madzi akuya kungapangidwe kumeneko.

en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
ny: Imfa zambiri zimachitika chifukwa cha kutopa kuyesa kusambira kubwerera motsutsana ndi mafunde, zomwe zingakhale zosatheka.

en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
ny: Mukangotuluka mu mafunde, kusambira kumbuyo sikovuta kwambiri kuposa nthawi zonse.

en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
ny: Yesani kuyang'ana kwinakwake kumene simukugwidwanso kapena, malingana ndi luso lanu ndipo ngati mwawonedwa, mungafune kuyembekezera kupulumutsidwa.

en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
ny: Kachiwiri kulowa mantha akubwera mwamsanga kuposa chikhalidwe mantha (pali zochepa za gawo honeymoon), amakhala nthawi yaitali, ndipo akhoza kukhala kwambiri.

en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
ny: Apaulendo omwe anali ndi nthawi yosavuta kusinthira ku chikhalidwe chatsopano nthawi zina amakhala ndi nthawi yovuta kwambiri kusintha ku chikhalidwe chawo.

en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
ny: Mukabwerera kwanu mutatha kukhala kunja, mwazolowera chikhalidwe chatsopano ndipo mwataya zizolowezi zanu zina kuchokera ku chikhalidwe cha kwanu.

en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
ny: Pamene munapita kunja poyamba, anthu mwina anali oleza mtima ndi kumvetsetsa, podziwa kuti apaulendo m'dziko latsopano ayenera kusintha.

en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
ny: Anthu sangayembekezere kuti kuleza mtima ndi kumvetsetsa n'kofunikanso kwa apaulendo obwerera kwawo.

en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
ny: Phokoso la piramidi ndi chiwonetsero cha kuwala ndi chimodzi mwazinthu zosangalatsa kwambiri m'deralo kwa ana.

en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
ny: Mutha kuwona mapiramidi mumdima ndipo mutha kuwawona mwakachetechete chiwonetsero chisanayambe.

en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
ny: Kawirikawiri inu nthawizonse pano phokoso la alendo ndi ogulitsa. Nkhani ya phokoso ndi kuwala ili ngati buku la nkhani.

en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
ny: Sphinx imayikidwa ngati kumbuyo ndi wolemba nkhani ya nkhani yayitali.

en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
ny: Zochitikazo zikuwonetsedwa pa mapiramidi ndipo mapiramidi osiyanasiyana amawunikira.

en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
ny: Zilumba za South Shetland, zomwe zinapezeka mu 1819, zikunenedwa ndi mayiko angapo ndipo zili ndi maziko ambiri, ndi khumi ndi zisanu ndi chimodzi zogwira ntchito mu 2020.

en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
ny: Zilumbazi zili pamtunda wa makilomita 120 kumpoto kwa chilumbachi. Waukulu kwambiri ndi King George Island ndi malo okhala a Villa Las Estrellas.

en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
ny: Zina zimaphatikizapo Livingston Island, ndi Chinyengo kumene caldera yosefukira ya phiri lophulika lomwe likugwirabe ntchito limapereka doko lachilengedwe lochititsa chidwi.

en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
ny: Ellsworth Land ndi dera kum'mwera kwa Peninsula, malire ndi Bellingshausen Sea.

en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
ny: Mapiri a Peninsula pano amaphatikizidwa kukhala chigwa, kenako amabweranso kuti apange unyolo wa 360 km wa mapiri a Ellsworth, omwe amaphatikizidwa ndi Minnesota Glacier.

en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
ny: Mbali yakumpoto kapena Sentinel Range ili ndi mapiri aatali kwambiri a Antarctica, Vinson Massif, yomwe ili pamwamba pa 4892 m Mount Vinson.

en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
ny: M'malo akutali, popanda foni yam'manja, foni ya satellite ingakhale njira yanu yokhayo.

en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
ny: Foni ya satellite nthawi zambiri si m'malo mwa foni yam'manja, popeza muyenera kukhala panja ndi mzere womveka bwino wa maso ku satellite kuti mupange foni.

en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
ny: Ntchitoyi imagwiritsidwa ntchito kawirikawiri potumiza, kuphatikizapo luso losangalatsa, komanso maulendo omwe ali ndi deta yakutali ndi zosowa za mawu.

en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
ny: Wopereka ntchito ya telefoni yakwanuko ayenera kukhala wokhoza kupereka zambiri zokhudza kulumikizana ndi ntchitoyi.

en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
ny: Njira yowonjezereka yotchuka kwa iwo omwe akukonzekera kusiyana-chaka ndikuyenda ndi kuphunzira.

en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
ny: Izi ndizotchuka kwambiri ndi osiya sukulu, kuwalola kutenga chaka chimodzi asanayambe yunivesite, popanda kusokoneza maphunziro awo.

en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
ny: Nthawi zambiri, kulembetsa pa kusiyana-chaka maphunziro kunja kwenikweni kusintha mwayi wanu kusamukira mu maphunziro apamwamba kumbuyo m'dziko lanu.

en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
ny: Kawirikawiri padzakhala ndalama zolipirira maphunziro kuti alembe mapulogalamu a maphunziro awa.

en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
ny: Finland ndi lalikulu bwato kopita. "Dziko la nyanja chikwi" lilinso ndi zilumba zikwizikwi, m'nyanja ndi m'zilumba za m'mphepete mwa nyanja.

en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
ny: Mu archipelagos ndi nyanja simukusowa kwenikweni yatchi.

en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
ny: Ngakhale kuti zilumba zam'mphepete mwa nyanja ndi nyanja zazikulu kwambiri ndithudi ndi zazikulu zokwanira yatchi iliyonse, mabwato ang'onoang'ono kapena ngakhale kayak amapereka zochitika zosiyana.

en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
ny: Bwato ndi zosangalatsa za dziko ku Finland, ndi bwato kwa anthu asanu ndi awiri kapena asanu ndi atatu alionse.

en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
ny: Izi zimagwirizana ndi Norway, Sweden ndi New Zealand, koma mwinamwake zapadera kwambiri (mwachitsanzo ku Netherlands chiwerengerocho ndi chimodzi mpaka makumi anayi).

en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
ny: Ambiri mwa maulendo osiyana a Baltic Cruises amakhala nthawi yaitali ku St. Petersburg, Russia.

en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
ny: Izi zikutanthauza kuti mutha kupita kumzinda wa mbiri yakale kwa masiku angapo athunthu pobwerera ndikugona pa sitimayo usiku.

en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
ny: Ngati mungopita kumtunda pogwiritsa ntchito maulendo a shipboard simudzafunikira visa yosiyana (monga ya 2009).

en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
ny: Maulendo ena apanyanja amasonyeza Berlin, Germany m'mabrosha. Monga mukuonera kuchokera pamapu pamwamba Berlin palibe kumene pafupi nyanja ndi ulendo ku mzinda si m'gulu mtengo wa sitima.

en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
ny: Kuyenda pa ndege kungakhale chochitika chochititsa mantha kwa anthu a misinkhu yonse ndi zikhalidwe, makamaka ngati sanayendepo ndege kale kapena adakumana ndi chochitika choopsa.

en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
ny: Si chinthu chochititsa manyazi: sichikusiyana ndi mantha aumwini ndi kudana ndi zinthu zina zomwe anthu ambiri ali nazo.

en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
ny: Kwa ena, kumvetsetsa chinachake chokhudza momwe ndege zimagwirira ntchito komanso zomwe zimachitika paulendo wa ndege kungathandize kuthana ndi mantha omwe amachokera ku zosadziwika kapena kuti sakulamulira.

en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
ny: Makampani otumiza makalata amalipidwa bwino chifukwa chopereka zinthu mofulumira. Kawirikawiri, nthawi ndi yofunika kwambiri ndi zikalata zamalonda, malonda kapena zida zotsalira kuti zikonzedwe mwachangu.

en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
ny: Pa njira zina, makampani akuluakulu ali ndi ndege zawo, koma kwa njira zina ndi makampani ang'onoang'ono panali vuto.

en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
ny: Ngati iwo anatumiza zinthu ndi katundu ndege, pa njira zina mwina zinatenga masiku kupyola kutsitsa ndi miyambo.

en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
ny: Njira yokhayo yodutsa mofulumira inali kutumiza ngati katundu wofufuzidwa. Malamulo a ndege sadzawalola kutumiza katundu popanda wokwera, komwe mumabwera.

en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
ny: Njira zoonekeratu zouluka mu kalasi yoyamba kapena malonda ndi foloko kunja wad wandiweyani ndalama mwayi (kapena, bwino komabe, kupeza kampani yanu kuchita izo kwa inu).

en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
ny: Komabe, izi sizibwera zotsika mtengo: monga malamulo ovuta a chala, mungayembekezere kulipira nthawi zinayi zomwe chuma chachibadwa chimayenda pa bizinesi, ndi nthawi khumi ndi imodzi kwa kalasi yoyamba!

en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
ny: Nthawi zambiri, palibe chifukwa ngakhale kufunafuna kuchotsera kwa bizinesi kapena mipando yoyamba pa ndege zachindunji kuchokera ku A kupita ku B.

en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
ny: Airlines kudziwa bwino kuti pali gulu linalake pakati pa flyers amene ali ofunitsitsa kulipira dollar pamwamba mwayi kupeza kwinakwake mofulumira ndi mu chitonthozo, ndi mlandu mogwirizana.

en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
ny: Likulu la Moldova ndi Chişinău. Chilankhulo chakomweko ndi Chiromaniya, koma Chirasha chimagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri.

en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
ny: Moldova ndi dziko la mitundu yambiri lomwe lavutika ndi nkhondo ya mafuko.

en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
ny: Mu 1994, nkhondoyi inachititsa kuti pakhale dziko lodzitcha Transnistria Republic kum'mawa kwa Moldova, lomwe lili ndi boma lake komanso ndalama zake koma silidziwika ndi dziko lililonse la UN.

en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
ny: Kugwirizana kwachuma kwakhazikitsidwanso pakati pa zigawo ziwirizi za Moldova ngakhale kuti pali kulephera kwa zokambirana zandale.

en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
ny: Chipembedzo chachikulu ku Moldova ndi Chikhristu cha Orthodox.

en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
ny: İzmir ndi mzinda wachitatu waukulu ku Turkey wokhala ndi anthu okwana 3.7 miliyoni, doko lachiwiri lalikulu kwambiri pambuyo pa Istanbul, komanso malo abwino kwambiri oyendera.

en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
ny: Poyamba unali mzinda wakale wa Smurna, tsopano ndi malo amakono, otukuka, ndi otanganidwa a malonda, ozungulira gombe lalikulu ndi kuzunguliridwa ndi mapiri.

en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ny: The boulevards lonse, nyumba galasi-fronted ndi malo ogulitsira zamakono ali dotted ndi madenga chikhalidwe wofiira-tiled, msika m'zaka za m'ma 18, ndi mizikiti yakale ndi mipingo, ngakhale mzinda ali ndi mlengalenga kwambiri Mediterranean Europe kuposa Turkey miyambo.

en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
ny: Mudzi wa Haldarsvík umapereka malingaliro a chilumba chapafupi cha Eysturoy ndipo uli ndi tchalitchi chachilendo cha octagonal.

en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
ny: M'bwalo la tchalitchi, muli ziboliboli zosangalatsa za marble za nkhunda pamwamba pa manda ena.

en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
ny: Ndikofunikira theka la ola kuyenda m'mudzi wochititsa chidwi.

en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
ny: Kumpoto komanso mosavuta ndi tawuni yachikondi komanso yochititsa chidwi ya Sintra ndipo yomwe inatchuka kwa alendo pambuyo pa nkhani yowala ya ulemerero wake wolembedwa ndi Ambuye Byron.

en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
ny: Scotturb Bus 403 imayenda nthawi zonse kupita ku Sintra, kuyima ku Cabo da Roca.

en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
ny: Komanso kumpoto kukaona lalikulu Sanctuary wa Our Lady wa Fatima (Shrine), malo a padziko lonse wotchuka Marian apparitions.

en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
ny: Chonde kumbukirani kuti kwenikweni mukuyendera malo a manda ambiri, komanso malo omwe ali ndi tanthauzo pafupifupi losawerengeka kwa gawo lalikulu la anthu padziko lapansi.

en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
ny: Padakali amuna ndi akazi ambiri amoyo omwe anapulumuka nthawi yawo kuno, ndi ena ambiri omwe anali ndi okondedwa omwe anaphedwa kapena kugwira ntchito mpaka imfa kumeneko, Ayuda ndi osakhala Ayuda omwe.

en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
ny: Chonde chitani malowa ndi ulemu wonse, ulemu ndi ulemu woyenera. Musapange nthabwala za Holocaust kapena Nazi.

en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
ny: Musawononge malowo mwa kulemba kapena kukanda zojambulajambula m'nyumba.

en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
ny: Zinenero zovomerezeka za Barcelona ndi Chikatalani ndi Chisipanishi. Pafupifupi theka amakonda kulankhula Chikatalani, ambiri amamvetsetsa, ndipo pafupifupi aliyense amadziwa Chisipanishi.

en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
ny: Komabe, zizindikiro zambiri zimasonyezedwa kokha m'Chikatalani chifukwa zimakhazikitsidwa ndi lamulo monga chinenero choyamba cha boma.

en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
ny: Komabe, Chisipanishi chimagwiritsidwanso ntchito kwambiri m'zoyendera za anthu onse ndi malo ena.

en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ny: Zolengeza nthawi zonse ku Metro zimapangidwa kokha mu Chikatalani, koma kusokonezeka kosakonzedwa kumalengezedwa ndi dongosolo lokhazikika m'zinenero zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo Chisipanishi, Chingerezi, Chifalansa, Chiarabu ndi Chijapanizi.

en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
ny: Anthu a ku Paris ali ndi mbiri ya kukhala odzikonda, amwano ndi odzikuza.

en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
ny: Ngakhale izi nthawi zambiri zimangokhala zolakwika zolakwika, njira yabwino kwambiri yokhalira ku Paris akadali kukhala pa khalidwe lanu labwino kwambiri, kuchita ngati munthu yemwe ali "bien élevé" (wobweretsedwa bwino). Zidzapangitsa kukhala kosavuta kwambiri.

en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
ny: Kunja kwadzidzidzi kwa anthu a ku Paris kudzatha mofulumira ngati muwonetsa ulemu wina woyambirira.

en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
ny: Malo osungirako zachilengedwe a Plitvice Lakes ali ndi nkhalango zambiri, makamaka ndi mitengo ya beech, spruce, ndi fir, ndipo ali ndi chisakanizo cha zomera za Alpine ndi Mediterranean.

en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
ny: Ili ndi mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya zomera, chifukwa cha mitundu yake ya microclimates, nthaka yosiyana ndi milingo yosiyanasiyana ya kutalika.

en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
ny: M'derali mulinso mitundu yosiyanasiyana kwambiri ya nyama ndi mbalame.

en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ny: Nyama zosowa monga chimbalangondo cha bulauni cha ku Ulaya, mmbulu, chiwombankhanga, owl, lynx, mphaka wakutchire ndi capercaillie zingapezeke kumeneko, pamodzi ndi mitundu yambiri yofala

en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
ny: Pamene akuyendera nyumba za amonke, azimayi amafunikira kuvala masiketi ophimba mawondo ndikuphimbidwa mapewa awo, nawonso.

en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
ny: Nyumba zambiri za amonke zimapereka zokutira kwa amayi omwe amabwera osakonzekera, koma ngati mubweretsa zanu, makamaka zokhala ndi mitundu yowala, mudzapeza kumwetulira kuchokera kwa mmonke kapena sisitere pakhomo.

en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
ny: M'mphepete mwa mzere womwewo, amuna amafunika kuvala mathalauza ophimba mawondo.

en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
ny: Izinso zikhoza kubwerekedwa kuchokera ku katundu pakhomo koma zovala zimenezo sizitsukidwa pambuyo pa wogwiritsa ntchito aliyense kotero kuti simungamve bwino kuvala masiketi awa. Kukula kumodzi kumagwirizana ndi amuna onse!

en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
ny: Zakudya za Majorcan, monga za madera ofanana mu Mediterranean, zimachokera ku mkate, ndiwo zamasamba ndi nyama (nyama ya nkhumba yapadera), ndipo zimagwiritsa ntchito mafuta a azitona mkati monsemo.

en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
ny: Chakudya chamadzulo chosavuta chotchuka, makamaka m'chilimwe, ndi Pa amb Oli: Mkate wokhala ndi mafuta a azitona, tomato, ndi zokometsera zilizonse zomwe zilipo monga tchizi, nsomba, ndi zina zotero.

en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
ny: Maina onse, pambali pa mawu akuti Sie kwa inu, nthawi zonse amayamba ndi kalata yaikulu, ngakhale pakati pa chiganizo.

en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
ny: Iyi ndi njira yofunika kwambiri yosiyanitsa pakati pa maverebu ena ndi zinthu.

en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
ny: Komanso mosakayikira zimapangitsa kuwerenga kukhala kosavuta, ngakhale kuti kulemba kuli kovuta pang'ono chifukwa chofunikira kupeza ngati verebu kapena adjective imagwiritsidwa ntchito mu mawonekedwe a substantivized.

en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
ny: Katchulidwe ndi kosavuta m'Chitaliyana popeza mawu ambiri amatchulidwa ndendende momwe amalembedwera

en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
ny: Zilembo zazikulu zomwe muyenera kusamala nazo ndi c ndi g, popeza katchulidwe kawo kamasiyanasiyana malinga ndi mavawelo otsatirawa.

en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
ny: Komanso, onetsetsani kutchula r ndi rr mosiyana: caro amatanthauza wokondedwa, pamene carro amatanthauza galeta.

en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
ny: Perisiya ali ndi galamala yosavuta komanso yambiri yokhazikika.

en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
ny: Chotero, kuŵerenga galamala ya galamala imeneyi kungakuthandizeni kuphunzira zambiri ponena za galamala ya ku Perisiya ndi kumvetsetsa bwino mawu.

en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
ny: Zosafunikira kunena, ngati mukudziwa chinenero cha Romance, zidzakhala zosavuta kuti muphunzire Chipwitikizi.

en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
ny: Komabe, anthu amene amadziŵa Chisipanishi pang'ono angaganize mofulumira kuti Chipwitikizi chili pafupi mokwanira kwakuti sichifunikira kuphunziridwa mosiyana.

en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
ny: Malo oyang'anira amakono asanayambe nthawi zambiri amakhala achikale masiku ano, ndipo amakhalabe ngati malo osungirako zinthu zakale, kapena malo ophunzitsira.

en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
ny: Monga kuipitsidwa kwa kuwala mu nyengo yawo sikunali mtundu wa vuto lomwe liri lero, nthawi zambiri amapezeka m'mizinda kapena m'makampu, osavuta kufika kuposa omwe amamangidwa masiku ano.

en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ny: Ma telescope ambiri ofufuza amakono ndi malo akuluakulu m'madera akutali omwe ali ndi mikhalidwe yabwino ya mlengalenga.

en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
ny: Kuwonera maluwa a Cherry, omwe amadziwika kuti hanami, akhala mbali ya chikhalidwe cha Japan kuyambira m'zaka za zana la 8.

en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
ny: Lingaliroli linachokera ku China komwe maluwa a plum anali maluwa osankhidwa.

en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
ny: Ku Japan, zipani zoyamba za maluwa a cherry zinachitidwa ndi mfumu yekha ndi mamembala ena a aristocracy kuzungulira Khoti Lachifumu.

en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
ny: Zomera zimawoneka bwino kwambiri pamene zili m'malo achilengedwe, choncho pewani chiyeso chochotsa ngakhale chitsanzo "chimodzi chokha".

en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
ny: Ngati kuyendera munda wokonzedwa mwalamulo, kusonkhanitsa "zitsanzo" kudzakutulutsanso, popanda kukambirana.

en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
ny: Singapore nthawi zambiri ndi malo otetezeka kwambiri kuti mukhale komanso osavuta kuyenda, ndipo mutha kugula pafupifupi chilichonse mutatha kufika.

en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
ny: Koma kuikidwa mu "malo otentha apamwamba" madigiri ochepa chabe kumpoto kwa equator mudzafunika kuthana ndi kutentha (nthawi zonse) ndi dzuwa lamphamvu (pamene thambo liri loyera, kawirikawiri).

en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
ny: Palinso mabasi angapo opita kumpoto ku Hebroni, manda amwambo a makolo akale a m'Baibulo Abrahamu, Isake, Yakobo, ndi akazi awo.

en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
ny: Fufuzani kuti basi yomwe mukuganiza kuti mutenga imapita ku Hebron osati ku mudzi wapafupi wa Ayuda wa Kiryat Arba.

en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
ny: Njira zamadzi zamkati zingakhale mutu wabwino wozika holide mozungulira.

en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
ny: Mwachitsanzo kuyendera nyumba zachifumu ku Loire Valley, chigwa cha Rhine kapena kutenga ulendo wopita ku ma cites osangalatsa pa Danube kapena kukwera bwato m'mphepete mwa Erie Canal.

en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
ny: Amafotokozanso njira zotchuka zoyenda ndi kupalasa njinga.

en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
ny: Khirisimasi ndi imodzi mwa maholide ofunika kwambiri a Chikhristu, ndipo amakondwerera ngati tsiku lobadwa la Yesu.

en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
ny: Miyambo yambiri yozungulira holideyi yatengedwanso ndi anthu osakhulupirira m'mayiko achikristu komanso omwe si Akhristu padziko lonse lapansi.

en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
ny: Pali mwambo wodutsa usiku wa Isitala wogalamuka pa nthawi ina yowonekera kuti awone kutuluka kwa dzuwa.

en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
ny: Pali kumene Mkhristu zaumulungu mafotokozedwe a mwambo umenewu, koma mwina bwino chisanadze Christian Spring ndi Fertility mwambo.

en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ny: Matchalitchi ambiri achikhalidwe nthawi zambiri amachita Easter Vigil Loweruka usiku pa sabata la Isitala, ndipo mipingo nthawi zambiri imaphwanya chikondwerero pakati pa usiku kukondwerera kuuka kwa Khristu.

en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
ny: Nyama zonse zomwe poyamba zinafika m'zilumbazi zinabwera kuno mwina mwa kusambira, kuuluka kapena kuyandama.

en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
ny: Chifukwa cha mtunda wautali kuchokera ku kontinenti nyama zoyamwitsa zinalephera kuyenda ulendo wopanga kamba wamkulu kukhala nyama yaikulu yodyetsa ku Galapagos.

en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
ny: Kuyambira pamene munthu anafika ku Galapagos, nyama zambiri zoyamwitsa zayambitsidwa kuphatikizapo mbuzi, mahatchi, ng'ombe, makoswe, amphaka ndi agalu.

en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
ny: Mukapita kumadera a Arctic kapena Antarctic m'nyengo yozizira mudzakumana ndi usiku wa polar, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti dzuwa silituluka pamwamba pa horizon.

en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
ny: Izi zimapereka mwayi wabwino wowona Aurora borealis, popeza thambo lidzakhala mdima kwambiri kapena pang'ono kuzungulira koloko.

en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ny: Monga madera ali ndi anthu ochepa, ndipo kuipitsa kuwala chifukwa chake nthawi zambiri si vuto, mudzathanso kusangalala ndi nyenyezi.

en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
ny: Chikhalidwe cha ntchito ku Japan ndi chachikulu kwambiri komanso chovomerezeka kuti zomwe anthu akumadzulo angazolowere.

en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
ny: Zovala ndi zovala zamalonda, ndipo ogwira nawo ntchito amaitanana mayina a banja lawo kapena maudindo a ntchito.

en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
ny: Kugwirizana kuntchito n'kofunika kwambiri, kugogomezera khama la gulu m'malo motamanda zochita za munthu payekha.

en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
ny: Ogwira ntchito nthawi zambiri ayenera kupeza chivomerezo cha akuluakulu awo pazosankha zilizonse zomwe amapanga, ndipo akuyembekezeka kumvera malangizo a akuluakulu awo popanda kukayikira.
